item.title: Statement of professional values, ethics, and expectations
item.description: Code of Conduct for the UW Geoarchaeology Laboratory and Field Research Projects This document is primarily aimed at graduate students pursuing a PhD or masters degree. Some sections are also relevant to undergraduates, please ask if you have questions about what parts are appropriate to you. Purpose This document should be viewed as a tool to initiate discussion during the early stages of the graduate program, with an awareness that the relationship and expectations will evolve with time.
